definitions.title: adv.
definitions.body: eastward, to, toward, the E.;—Ge 25:6 (J), Le 1:16, Le 16:14, Nu 34:3, Nu 34:11, Nu 34:15, Jos 19:12, Jos 19:13 (all P), 1Ki 7:39 = 2Ch 4:10, 1Ki 17:3 = 2Ki 13:17, Ez Eze 8:16, Eze 8:16; + N, S, W, Ge 13:14, Ge 28:14 (both J), Nu 2:3, Nu 3:28, Nu 10:5 (N, W, in LXX), Nu 34:10 (all P); also as

definitions.title: n.
definitions.body: after [[פְּאַת]] = E. side, Ex 27:13, Ex 38:13 (both P), + W Ez Eze 45:7 (del. Co; rd. [[קֶדֶם]] Berthol Toy Krae), + N, S, W, Nu 35:5, Jos 18:20 so ´[[גְּבוּל ק]]: Jos 15:5 (all P).
